Content.Title: Pre-defines queries
Content.Text: Here you will find a selection of useful queries on zoonotic agents along the food chain from feed to animals to food. You can use these as a start and add to them by setting further filters, especially useful to get familiar with ZooNotify.

Text.Part3: isolates from animal samples of fattening pigs, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2011 - 2019.

Title.Part2: spp. from samples from laying hens

Text.Part1: Salmonella isolates from samples of laying hen flocks per federal state, Salmonella control programmes in poultry according to Regulation (EC) No 2160/2003, 2011 - 2020.
MRSA from samples of different matrices of veal calves, beef cattle and dairy cattle of different production types, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2010 - 2019.
Salmonella isolates from samples of different feedstuffs, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2012 - 2019.

Title.Part2: STEC from samples of plant-based foods

Text.Part1: STEC isolates from plant-based food samples from different sampling stages, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2012 - 2020.

Text.Part3: from samples of different matrices of broilers and poultry at retail, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2012 - 2020.
from crustaceans and tilapia/pangasius samples at retail, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2015 - 2019.

Title.Part2: spp. from food samples from chicken and turkeys

Text.Part3: spp. from samples of different matrices of laying hens, and broilers and turkeys at different sampling stages, Zoonoses-Monitoring, 2011 - 2020.
